definition: to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: In the beginning the training sessions were held at Volvo Trucks dealerships on Saturdays.
sentences.chinese: 最初的培训课程由沃尔沃卡车公司安排在周日进行。

sentences.english: Saturday and Sunday are defined by a sense of new beginning.
sentences.chinese: 周六及周日对你来说又是一个新的开始。

sentences.english: The picnic was put off until next Sunday.
Jane visited her mother every Sunday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 每周日下午简都有去看望她的母亲。

sentences.english: One day, I made an appointment with Wang Ping togo to the bookstore together on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我和王萍相约周日一路去书店。

sentences.english: This matter overturned all reasons that I learned on Sunday in the school.
sentences.chinese: 这件事把我从周日学校学到的所有道理都颠覆了。

sentences.english: Sunday's marathon was the eighth for the 27-year-old, who has been running for more than a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 上周日的马拉松比赛是这位27岁的女性第八次参赛。

sentences.english: Example: A biting, cold wind below in last Sunday, and temperatures dropped sharply in PuYang.
sentences.chinese: 濮阳上周日开始刮起刺骨的寒风，气温也急剧下降。

sentences.english: For Walcott and Gervinho a decision will be made on Saturday or Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 至于沃尔科特和热尔维尼奥，周六或周日将有定论。

sentences.english: The best-known British dish eaten at home has been roast beef, traditionally eaten on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 英国最出名的家庭菜是烤牛肉，通常在周日吃。

sentences.english: His team pulled 10 bodies out of Beichuan'shigh school Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 日本救援队周日在北川中学挖掘出10具尸体。

sentences.english: Police said Sunday that the death toll in the shooting rose to 86.
sentences.chinese: 警方周日公布射击死亡人数达到了86人。

sentences.english: Today, I and my classmates exchange Sunday and Saturday schedule.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我和同学一起交流周日和周六的日程。

sentences.english: And like for instance, this Sunday, I'm doing an event in a garden.
sentences.chinese: 比如，这周日，我要在一个花园里举办一个活动。

sentences.english: Investigators tried to speak to him on Sunday but Hasan asked for a lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员试图于周日跟哈桑谈话，但他要求见律师。

sentences.english: Last Sunday, I went to the Mount Lao with MEC members.
sentences.chinese: 上周日我同移动英语角的成员们去了崂山。
